Terms of Service


Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our app. By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions.


1. Eligibility
 • You must be 18 years or older to use this app.
 • You are responsible for ensuring compliance with any applicable laws in your jurisdiction.


2. Account Responsibilities
 • You are responsible for the security and confidentiality of your account information.
 • You agree to notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access to your account.


3. Prohibited Conduct
 By using our app, you agree NOT to:
 • Engage in illegal activities or promote violence.
 • Harass, abuse, or harm other users.
 • Post content that is obscene, defamatory, or inappropriate.
 • Attempt to access unauthorized areas of the app or our servers.


4. Intellectual Property
 • All content in this app is protected by copyright, trademarks, and other intellectual property laws.
 • You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content without permission.


5. Privacy
 • Your personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy.


6. Limitation of Liability
 • Our app is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
 • We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from your use of the app.


7. Termination
 • We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms.


8. Changes to Terms
 • We may update these Terms of Service periodically. Continued use of the app signifies your acceptance of any changes.


Thank you for using our app! If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us.

Privacy Policy


Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.


1. Information We Collect
 • Personal Information: Information such as your name, email address, phone number, and account details.
 • Usage Information: Information about how you use our app, including pages visited, actions taken, and time spent on the app.
 • Device Information: Information such as your device type, operating system, and IP address.


2. How We Use Your Information
 • To provide and improve our services.
 • To personalize your experience within the app.
 • To communicate important updates and information to you.
 • To monitor and improve app performance and troubleshoot issues.


3. Sharing Your Information
 • We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
 • We may share information with service providers who help us operate the app.
 • We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our legal rights.


4. Security
 • We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access and misuse.
 • However, no system is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.


5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
 • We may use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.
 • You can control cookie settings through your device or browser settings.


6. Data Retention
 • We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.


7. Your Rights
 • You have the right to access, update, or delete your information.
 • You may contact us to exercise your rights.


8. Children's Privacy
 • Our app is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.


9. Changes to Privacy Policy
 • We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Continued use of the app signifies your acceptance of any changes.


10. Contact Us
 If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [your_contact_email].


Thank you for trusting us with your information.
